name: ebay_compare_prices
description: Compare prices for a product across multiple eBay listings. Searches for the product and returns listings sorted by price with seller info, condition, and shipping costs for easy comparison.

parameters.name: query
parameters.description: Product to compare prices for (e.g. 'iPhone 15 Pro 256GB', 'PS5 Digital Edition')

steps.label: Search eBay sorted by price + shipping lowest first

steps.code: const listings = []; const items = document.querySelectorAll('.srp-results .s-item, .srp-river-results .s-item, li.s-item'); for (let i = 0; i < Math.min(items.length, 20); i++) { const el = items[i]; const titleEl = el.querySelector('.s-item__title, .s-item__title span'); const linkEl = el.querySelector('.s-item__link, a.s-item__link'); const priceEl = el.querySelector('.s-item__price, .s-item__price span.POSITIVE, .s-item__price span.BOLD'); const shippingEl = el.querySelector('.s-item__shipping, .s-item__freeXDays, .s-item__logisticsCost'); const conditionEl = el.querySelector('.SECONDARY_INFO, .s-item__subtitle span'); const sellerEl = el.querySelector('.s-item__seller-info-text, .s-item__seller-info a'); const sellerRatingEl = el.querySelector('.s-item__seller-info .s-item__seller-info-text, .s-item__etrs-text'); const soldEl = el.querySelector('.s-item__quantitySold, .s-item__hotness, [class*="sold"]'); const imgEl = el.querySelector('.s-item__image-wrapper img, .s-item__image img'); const formatEl = el.querySelector('.s-item__purchase-options, .s-item__detail--primary .BOLD'); const locationEl = el.querySelector('.s-item__itemLocation, .s-item__location'); const title = titleEl ? titleEl.textContent.trim() : ''; if (!title || title === 'Shop on eBay' || title === 'Results matching fewer words') continue; listings.push({ title: title, price: priceEl ? priceEl.textContent.trim() : '', shipping: shippingEl ? shippingEl.textContent.trim() : '', total_estimate: '', condition: conditionEl ? conditionEl.textContent.trim() : '', format: formatEl ? formatEl.textContent.trim() : '', seller: sellerEl ? sellerEl.textContent.trim() : '', seller_rating: sellerRatingEl ? sellerRatingEl.textContent.trim() : '', sold_count: soldEl ? soldEl.textContent.trim() : '', location: locationEl ? locationEl.textContent.trim() : '', image: imgEl ? imgEl.getAttribute('src') : '', url: linkEl ? linkEl.href : '' }); } return { query: `{{query}}`, listing_count: listings.length, sorted_by: 'price_plus_shipping_lowest', listings: listings, compared_at: new Date().toISOString() }
steps.name: price_comparison
steps.label: Extract and compare prices
